reviews.name: Skil 4-1/2" Paddle Switch Grinder, 7.5 Amps
reviews.reviewText: the only reason i like this,it is because of my father who does construction who is a shop steward, an he gets nothing but the best tools because of there durability and he keeps them for a long time. and i like the worm saw with the 8in blade.
reviews.title: because of the heavy duty metal gearing,wrench sto

reviews.name: Skil 4-1/2" Paddle Switch Grinder, 7.5 Amps
reviews.reviewText: When I bought this tool, I wasn't sure how much use I was going to get out of it. But after having had it for almost two months, I wouldn't be without it in my shop. Not only have I sharpened lawn mower and tool blades, but I've also used the grinder to shape brackets and hooks for a renovation project I've been working on. this is a tool that's going to get a lot of work in my shop and it feels like it's built to last for the long haul.
reviews.title: Grinder that will satisfy anyone's demands

reviews.name: Skil 4-1/2" Paddle Switch Grinder, 7.5 Amps
reviews.reviewText: I bought this about 2 months ago and have had no issues thus far. it is very east to hold and use. i would recommend this tool to anyone.
reviews.title: great tool at reasonable price!
